explains: adj. 令人难以置信的；令人惊异的

sentences.en: The amount of paperwork involved is mind-boggling.
sentences.cn: 相关的书面工作量大得令人难以想象。

sentences.en: The amount of biological data being created today is mind-boggling.
sentences.cn: 当今时代正在创建的生物学数据的数量是惊人的。

sentences.en: The complexity of subway systems around the world is mind-boggling.
sentences.cn: 全世界地铁系统错综复杂，令人眼花缭乱。
